plot: Tong, a ten year old boy, believes he has special powers. With his grandmother on her deathbed, Tong attempts to perform his last miracle to change the course of destiny.
title: My One Last Miracle
plot_es: Tong, a ten year old boy, believes he has special powers. With his grandmother on her deathbed, Tong attempts to perform his last miracle to change the course of destiny.
plot_en: Tong, a ten year old boy, believes he has special powers. With his grandmother on her deathbed, Tong attempts to perform his last miracle to change the course of destiny.
